package.name: XML_fo2pdf
package.summary: Converts a xsl-fo file to pdf/ps/pcl/text/etc with the help of apache-fop

release.notes: - runs with fop 0.20 - call of java objects is completely rewritten - $fop = new XML_fo2pdf("input.fo") should not be used anymore, use $fop->run("input.fo") instead - can output not only pdf, but also ps/pcl/txt and whatever fop supports
